name: Nelson Smith
description: I Am a Widower, I lost my wife 5years ago in a car accident, I have a child, his name is Ethan, His 17 years old..Am an Army, A Brigadier General in the United states Arm Force..I was born in Spain, But i later moved to my country, At the age 12 when my parents Died..I lived with a woman who helped me so much, Till i joined the Army at age of 21, I took her like my mother till she Died..Right now, Am 52years old, And am Retiring next month, OCTOBER .I really love to meet with a beautiful,God fearing,Honest,Loving,Caring,Funny,a woman who understands,And a woman who is always there for you
